name: Barkour
description:
Traverse through the obstacle course.
It can be quite tricky, so don't be discouraged.

Highly recommended you play with a gamepad if you have one. The dog leg jumping mechanic works best with an analog stick.
It is still completable with keyboard controls.

A game by Wayne Petzler (@waynepetzler)
with music by charlie toØ human (@CharlietooHuman)
